text: Yeng-u, houjik eina nakhoigi nanakta ahumlaksuba oina laknaba thourang touri. Aduga eina nakhoida karisu potlum oihalloi. Maramdi eina pamba adu nakhoigi lan-thum adu natte adubu nakhoini. Maramdi machasingna mama-mapagidamak tungsinpham thokte adubu mama-mapana machasinggidamak tungsinpham thok-i.
